mutants.mutated_line: word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text).lower()
    words = text.split()
    stop_words = {'', 'and', 'of', 'in', 'a', 'an', 'to', 'on', 'for', 'with', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were'}
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts

mutants.mutated_line: word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))

    stop_words = {'the', 'and', 'of', 'in', 'a', 'an', 'to', 'on', 'for', 'with', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were'}

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text).lower()
    words = text.split()
    stop_words = {'the', 'and', 'of', 'in', 'a', 'an', 'to', 'on', 'for', 'with', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were'}
    word_counts = Counter((word for word in words if word not in stop_words))
    sorted_word_counts = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_counts
